duties_responsibilities.duty: Hire, grow, and lead a high-performance team of software, data, and AI/ML engineers.
Develop and execute the technical roadmap and architecture of the Spice data and AI platform.
Apply experience in building and scaling big data and AI systems, lead by example, and create a culture of excellence.
Lead the company-wide technical strategy and execution.
Attract, hire, grow, and mentor a team of software, data, and AI/ML engineers.
Build and grow an engaged technical community and industry-leading thought leadership.

education_certification.credential: Experience in startups, open-source projects, AI/ML, data platforms, and distributed systems.
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or related field.
